name: Flush Balm Cream Blush
about: What it is: An impossible-to-mess-up cream blush that effortlessly melts into the skin for a perfect, all day flush...Highlighted Ingredients:.Vitamin E: Helps to nourish and condition the skin..Coverage: Light.Finish: Radiant.Formulation: Stick.Highlighted Ingredients: - Vitamin E: Nourishes and conditions skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Lightweight and flexible, this buildable balm blends easily into the skin, leaving a transparent veil of color that allows your natural skin to show through. Perfect for cheeks and lips, its creamy, multi-use formula features vitamin E to nourish skin for a long-lasting glow that's never heavy or cakey. It also contains microfine pigment powders that give a sheer wash of color, so it always impossible to mess up...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Vitamin E: Helps to nourish and condition the skin...Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Synthetic Wax, Hydrogenated Poly (C6-14 Olefin), Silica, Diisostearyl Malate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax, Cire Microcristalline), Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Methicone, Tocopherol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane. May Contain (+/-): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491/77492/77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake), CI 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake)....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe onto cheeks or lips..-Blend in with your fingertips, brush, or sponge.  .-Layer for more color payoff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this but didn't love it.  The colour is very nice and easy to blend.  However, very sheer but buildable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the mini trio set which had Bespoke in it and knew I needed the full size when they finally released it.  Bespoke is the best shade of any blush I've ever used. It's comparable to Violette_FR shade Louisa. It applies so smoothly and gives such a natural flush. The best no makeup-makeup shade. For reference I'm light-medium with neutral undertones.   This is a safe blind buy imo. Completely worth the $30 if you can swing it but I guess if you're reading reviews you must be able to lol.

reviews.review_title: Le BonBon is HANDS DOWN the best blush of Merits!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own 6 of Merit's flush balm cream blushes, and this new color is the best one they've come out with. It is by far the most opaque shade they've made yet, and has a lot longer staying power. I love the formula either way, but this shade is particularly well performing and my favorite color for my super fair neutral/cool skin! So glad they came out with it. 100/10 stars.

reviews.review_text: This blush is so GOOD!!!! The color is the most unique color that I've seen for a blush in a long time. Merit formula is beautiful, the color is vibrant, but it blends to perfection, leaving you with a sun kissed look but the cool toned version. It's a mix of red and berry. I love it, would 100% recommend. My skin is combination to oily, and it lasts really well on me w/o powder. I also have the merit and t28 blushes, it's less glowy than the merit more similar to the t28 in texture, but this one blends a little better, and you can build it up more.

reviews.review_text: definitely one of my top favorite cream blushes. It's super smooth, blends easily, and gives a natural, dewy finish without feeling heavy. It's great for anyone looking for a blush that wears well with minimal makeup. I've even worn it over just a tinted SPF, and it looked fantastic. I like to be cheeky with my blush! I really had to apply quite a bit of the product to get the shade I desired, but it is marketed as a baby pink and is designed to give you that glow from within look. I will be purchasing more blush from this line to try out the different colors.

Will hold onto it for a few days before returning it and going with a different brand.

I see people complaining about how fast it wears off and I agree that is true for other shades- but not Cheeky. Something about this specific color is so perfect. The formula is soft and buttery, it blends out like a dream, is the perfect cool-toned pink, and LASTS! Like this color lasts a full day on me even in the summer. reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a less pigmented cream or liquid blush and asked the Sephora staff for help. (Shout out to the lovely folks at the SoPo store!). I'm relatively pale, either light or light-medium in most lines' foundations and I am tired of spending forever trying to blend out blush to the point where I can walk around in public. The incredibly pigmented products are not for me unless I were doing stage makeup, I suppose. So I asked the staff for some recc's saying I'd rather have to build up blush than try and calm it down and they recommended this and the Ilia.   This is PERFECT. Easy to apply, easy to blend and move if needed and builds up in layers if you want more punch. Cheeky is almost exactly the color I flush and is exactly what I wanted.   I'm not a full coverage foundation person, so I can't speak to the reviews saying it doesn't work with it. I wear either the iris and Romeo best skin days or Pat McGrath foundation and this works well with both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

I will say to get the depth of color I like I need to apply 2 or 3 times and I do t believe it has the all day staying power I prefer, however all in all a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't do a whole makeup routine with multiple steps which can be the reason I have problems with getting certain products to stay on my face for the duration of the day simply because I don't have time and knowledge to do it correctly. I also have pretty sensitive skin when it comes to makeup. I have tried multiple cream based blushes to avoid making my skin drier and avoiding the powder blush palettes breaking during my travel. I ended up with my skin getting irritated by excessively blending out the product because it was super pigmented and became patchy by the end of my day. I tried many methods of applying, but they didn't work and I gave up on blush. Until someone recommended this one to me. The color (cheeky) was perfect for exact vibe I was going for, blended out so smoothly, buildable, wasn't drying to my skin, and not sticky. It started off super light when I applied, almost giving like a natural redness moment, and as I applied more it became more present. I found this convenient because most cream blushes start off super pigmented even after you use a little bit. That's fine, but if you're like me and don't have time to be blending and your skin is easily irritated, then that won't do. I also haven't noticed any acne come up from using this product, so let's hope that's not temporary. 5/5 !

This color is just so natural and the perfect shade of pink, I am very excited to continue to try the other shades!

I would  only recommend this to someone with perfect skin who doesn't wear foundation and just wants a nice flush this is not for the full coverage girlies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: SAVE YOUR MONEY AND GET RARE BEAUTY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

The color is almost a watercolor effect and blends perfectly. If you liked the milk makeup jelly tint blushes but found them too hard to apply evenly then go for these. Applies so nicely with just your fingers.

reviews.review_text: Great product for natural makeup days! Definitely gives u201cFrench girl vibesu201d nice flush to the skin. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is perfect but colorful so you just have to be careful when you apply!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is very easy to use and very pretty! it's subtle but also a beautiful pop of color! i get lots of compliments wearing it! this color is also very natural and a perfect color for any season

reviews.review_text: I have light olive skin and found the blush Beverly Hills had low pigment; it litterly melts into your skin and disappears. I like a somewhat natural flushed youthful look but found perhaps this colour wasn't very noticeable on my skin. Maybe a brighter or pinkier colour would work better. Texture of the product is nice on the skin however.
Honestly, feels like smearing lip gloss on your face. Not pleasant, high shine and low pigment. Would not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this baby pink shade ud83eude77 very flattering, works great on my super fair, oily skin. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_title: Very pretty pigment for eyes, lips and cheeks.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream blush more than some others because it is very pigmented, but if you want it, sheer you just build it up to your liking. It goes on very easily without messing up my makeup underneath. No patchy areas. It blends in flawlessly, and i have found that the best application process is to use my fingers to blend it in. Deducted one star for horrible packaging. I do not care for the packaging at all. It is a very, very cheap plastic container that is super flimsy and definitely will get broken in a crowded makeup bag or drawer.

reviews.review_title: Must have for clean girl makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does nothing and lasts for five minutes. Can't believe I've bought more than one of these. And let me tell you, the red shade is disgusting. Merit is very hir or miss.

reviews.review_title: A lovely wash of color that's easy to blend!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little hesitant about this product after hearing that it kind of disappears on skin, BUT I'm also afraid of overusing blush so decided to give it a try. In my experience, it's the perfect wash of sunkissed color that's super blendable and impossible to over-do. It also stays all day for me if I set it with a velour puff and translucent powder.   Color-wise, this is a lovely warm orange-red tone. I'm an autumn and it makes my skin and eyes look bright and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 43 years old, fair skin with pink undertones.   I've worn this with bare skin and sheer moisturizing tint, and I've never been this happy with a blush. Coverage is incredibly natural and comfortable. I add this to my lips as well, over a natural liner, and the look is lovely.  Would not recommend for heavy coverage foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend recommended this to me so I had to try it and I'm glad I did! it's a little pricy but the product doesn't disappoint. The color payoff is a little sheer but it is buildable. I wish the shade range was bigger but overall I'm pleased with my purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Poorly pigmented for darker skin tones  Was disappointing and waste to use on cheeks and lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!! Balmy texture, sheer but buildable. I have naturally oily/combo skin but like that glowy look this provides. Does not dry down so set it if you touch your face a lot, lasting power is just okay but I don't mind reapplying. Will purchase other colors!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for use on bare skin! I apply either with brush, or on the daily with my fingers. It lasts all day on bare skin, and looks really natural. I got fox and Beverly Hills, they are perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing formula. Easy to apply and it doesn't absorb into your skin, so it looks just as fresh several hours after applying it. I am a little disappointed the color. I thought it'd be more red but it's really pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colour and texture but sadly, does not last! Even with primer and setting spray, I need to reapply hourly so it was a no for me. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am inexperienced with makeup but this was so easy to use! Creamy formula, blendable with my fingers, and buildable pigment! My friends just ask if I spent some time outside and got some sun because it doesn't look like makeup at all! I agree with the other reviews saying that it doesn't last very long but I am also not using any kind of setting spray/powder. I don't mind reapplying though! Buying more colors<333

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for quite a while now, I love the light, buildable, and natural tint of the Fox - Warm Taupe cream blush. It's a great multi-purpose balm (blush, eyes).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is like gold. It gives me a natural glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it blends so well and the color is insanely pretty but I have to re-apply it multiple times because it doesn't last long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is really good I use it daily it has just the right color for my skin tone and has a cute subtle but noticeable look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation, this shade makes the blush look natural on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found my new favorite go to.  It is absolutely perfect for the best dewy sun-kissed cheeks.  I feel that this shade could improve in two ways: shade consistency and shade opacity.  I waited awhile before buying this blush, but broke down when I couldn't get shade u201cBeverly Hillsu201d out of my head. I feel that the shade I swatched is different than the shade I purchased. It is a minor difference, but a difference, none the less. I also feel that I have a hard time building color like I want to, and when I do, the product appears too splotchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cream blushes terrify me, no idea why, but I fell IN LOVE with this! It was super easy to apply and I used my finger to blend. The color is probably one of the nicest blush colors I have used and it lasted an entire night without fading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A great cream blush.  Lasts all day.  Easy to manipulate and love around, but then sets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice for learning how to apply blush properly; it's difficult to mess up. It goes on subtly and blends in very easily. I also like the color. However, even with primer, powder, and setting spray, as others have said, it doesn't have a lot of staying power. I've found that over applying it before putting powder on does help. It still looks subtle enough under the powder and seems to last a bit longer. I don't generally need my makeup to last all that long, so I like it. But I know people that really need their makeup to stay in place during a busy, active day probably would not.   Also on a side note, I really don't like the packaging. It feels extremely lightweight, flimsy, and cheap. Make sure you screw the top on tightly, too. Mine has fallen off in my makeup bag once already. It hasn't yet since I've been careful to tighten as much as possible before putting it back, though.   So overall it's okay and I got it during the sale and will keep and use it. I probably won't be repurchasing though.

reviews.review_title: Skin breaking out but such cute packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this was so perfect, i loved the packaging. But it definitely is making my skin irritated and break out right away. Even though it's vegan and very creamy, moisturizing smth irritates my sensitive dry skin returning :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I hate to return anything but this will be returned. I gave it a 2 because if you have dry skin I could see it being better than some brands out there, but the colour it gives won't last long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got suckered in by the cute packaging. I just love holding this little blush and swiping it directly on my cheek, then blending with fingers for a quick morning makeup routine. It's a beautiful flush of color. It doesn't last all day though so make sure to put a powder blush on top if you want it to last longer. I don't really care because I just use it mostly for quick trips

reviews.review_title: Don't bother. Dont believe the fake reviews.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush doesn't exist. What do I mean? You apply it and it's gone an hour later. Maybe less. This clash did not last two hours. It just disappeared. Might as well have put clear Vaseline on my face. Total waste of money. Between Face Base and Merit my makeup slid off of my face today. As you can see my oUnlike these other nonsense reviews I do not use filters and show the makeup in sunlight. This is after 9 hours of wear ontop of the god awful Face Base by Bobbi Brown I will also be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using the product for a few weeks. Easy application. Love the color. My only complaint is that it isn't long lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the feel of this product, its creamy and light. Easily buildable and effortlessly glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Persimmon is exactly what I was looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: So creamy and easy to blend! Very beginner friendly, and it's a beautiful finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It blends out beautifully and is a really buildable color! It lasted all night. I'm really impressed, and I can't wait to try the other color I bought!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the formula but the color Stockholm was not my favorite. Also, I wish the packaging was less bulky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my new favorite blush!! perfect for a simple dewy look I loveeeeee

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite every-day blush.  The cream is easy to work with, long lasting and looks beautiful.  Amazing color.  It's perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coming from someone who is a skincare and haircare over makeup girly this blush is gorgeous. I have very pale ghostly skin and this colour is a dream to blend and very buildable. I read other reviews saying it doesn't last on the skin but personally I haven't noticed any fading when I've worn it. My new everyday blush and will definitely be buying more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So easy to use and creamy and easy to blend! Very dewy so it isn't long lasting but it's perfect for an everyday makeup look. I wouldn't buy this if you're a full glam girly though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This color is a great fit for my skin tone as it matches the color of my lips. The product is blendable, glowy, and looks very natural. However, it does not last all day.

J'adore ce produit. L'effet est naturel mais present. Un teint bonne mine et qui ne donne pas de boutons. Parfait pour un no makeup makeup look ou combine u00e0 un blush en poudre ou highlight pour un look du soir.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite cream blush! It's not overly pigmented so you don't accidentally end up looking like a clown. It's buildable. Glides and blends nicely. One of my staples!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is easy to blend and long lasting. It does not break me out which was the most important factor to me. I'm always on the go so this blush is convenient since it blends quickly.

reviews.review_title: Is pigment in the room with us?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it, it looked so cute and easy to use but pigment is just not there at all, you have to swatch multiple times to see any colour pay off. Save your money and don't buy it,I  regret not returning this. I could say the same about the highlighter from this brand I picked up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this product, I was honestly disappointed with the pigment payoff. However, after switching my application from applying directly on the skin to using a medium-sized denser brush I am a fan! Being on the more sheer side, it will inevitably not last quite as long on the skin as I would like (I'm generally wearing makeup anywhere from 8-14 hours) without reapplication, but the color Stockholm is just so gorgeous that I can't even be that mad. It's so lovely that I'll probably have to get another color soon!

reviews.review_title: Does the job but really disappointing packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a great color that blends well. Easy to use as you just swipe on as the last step and buff out with a brush of choice. I do like the merit brush! However, the packaging feels cheap, light, thin plastic all around. It's nice when it's new and rounded for some relatively precise application, but as you use it, you're left with a big bulky application area. The worst part is the wastefulness. There is almost half a container of product below the lip of the container that you can't access! They desperately need to have packaging that pushes up that product. There's no easy way to dig out that remaining product without defeating the purpose of the swipe on blush. For a brand that pushes clean, it's very wasteful packaging and I will be moving on to another brand after this one is gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first cream blush I've tried and it is a stunning shade! The application is great too. The pigment is not very good and takes a few swipes to show up. It leaves the skin feeling a bit cakey.

reviews.review_title: Good blush alternative to blush sticks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy to use and quick application. Doesn't blend as well as blush sticks but this is a great simple alternative and fits well into makeup bags when traveling.

reviews.review_title: Purchased every shade, none are pigmented
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually purchased this in every color and none are pigmented and doesn't last. I am very pale and have oily/combo skin, but even applied to fresh, clean skin with moisturizer only you can barely see it. Even with the Apres and berry shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's as good as they say. Blends well. Not drying. Tiny but good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is excellent, very sheer so I definitely need to build up on it but it gives me an amazing finish. Red blush is the way to go

reviews.review_title: My favorite blush of all time

reviews.review_text: Love the way this looks on my skin. Feels great too! Many people say it fades really fast but unless you are putting makeup on top of it, it shouldn't look too sheer. ! I use this on top of makeup, but most of the time it's whenever I want to go for a no makeup look for the day. Highly recommend this, especially for anyone who likes natural makeup looks. Blends amazingly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these blushes. They are so easy to blend and not too pigmented which is great for my fair skin. they are build able as well and I love how dewy they look too. I highly recommend all of these blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is one of the only blushes i find myself going back to use consistently! the coverage is perfect and it lasts a good amount of time. so easy to apply and blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Soooo good! Buttery smooth formula and buildable coverage. Gives the perfect flush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Good for natural/no makeup makeup days

reviews.review_text: Love the color and feel of the formula, but it is extremely natural looking. It is not necessarily a bad thing, but it'd depend on what you're looking for. Also, do not be surprised by the small packaging, actually 9gr for the product is a rather fair amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This color is just beautiful. And I love how this formula adds moisture to my skin!  It feels like this will last forever since a little goes a long way. Easy to blend with just my fingertips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lasts all day, and the pigment is beautiful! This has been my go-to Winter shade. The formula is so easy to work with!

reviews.review_title: Best cool pink colour out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you were a fan of glossiers cloud paint I found this to be similar if not better. It leaves a lovely glow and stays on throughout the day. It's so easy to apply and blends in so easily, you can apply it in 10 seconds. My only complaint is that once the blush is near the end of it's life it's hard to apply - you kind of have to scoop it out of the container. The price tag is a lot too but I can't give it up at this point!

reviews.review_title: Pretty, but not a lot of staying power
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this blush, but I find it does not have staying power.  It's a very pretty colour, and goes on nice. However, I do find that it's fallen off my face by mid-afternoon (makeup done at 7am)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to blend, and lasts all day! This is the perfect blush for me. I naturally have very red cheeks so most blushes put it over the top but this compliments the color and makes it more cohesive with my face. It's adorable and easily buildable. I blend it in with my fingers for a natural flawless look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful shade but it took off my concealer and doesn't last long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this color and how soft and pretty it is. However, it does not last and I'm having to reapply mid day. I'd rather go for the Ilia Multi stick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this product for almost a year. I love love love it so much. All i can say is it's a nice smooth formula that blends beautifully and seamlessly, feels lightweight, and has a dewy finish which I love. The only thing I've noticed though is it fails to last on my face :( I put it on in the mornings before school and about 4 hours later it is gone. That being said, I do put powder products on top in hopes of it lasting, but it doesn't. I say for the price the lasting power should be greater, so I am going to find a new product instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looks very pretty when applied but fades so quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: not super long lasting but easy to apply and very pretty!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: beverly hills shade is stunning! the blush goes on nice and smooth. it has sort of a glossy finish, i love it! unfortunately it does wear off sort of quickly, but i will definitely be purchasing again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS! easy to apply and such a cute color. Looks very natural. easier to apply than other cream blushes I have tried. can be used as a lip tint too and the color is cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous color, I have light skin with neutral undertones and love cheeky for my everyday blush. Blendable and love the radiant finish which isn't glittery or too much for the office. Taking off 1 star because there isn't a ton of product for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the formula for this product! Application is easy and smooth. It's easy to carry around and simple to use.

reviews.review_title: Was look for more pigment, over all loved it!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a very fant color I would go Beverly Hills. Love the formula I would have like to have better packaging that will twist up more product when needed.Good product overall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shades and so easy to use. Only wish it lasted longer. You have to reapply throughout the day but the good thing is it fits in your purse!

reviews.review_title: Great color, quick and easy to apply.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like spending a lot of time doing makeup and I love how easy this is. Plus I was sick of powder blushes breaking during travel and making a huge mess. This is easy to apply and control where it goes and the color is great. I got Cheeky in a favorites set and recently purchased Fox. I love both colors but Fox is my favorite. I have red hair and Fox goes so well with my skintone and hair color.

reviews.review_title: A must for low maintenance babes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best blush! I keep some in my purse, it goes on easy and natural, just dab and pat with clean fingertips. Can also use as eyeshadow and lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush!! I even recommend the blush to my mother because it's just so pretty!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color, easy to apply and blend, buildable. love it!

reviews.review_title: One of my favourite go-to blushes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush in the shade Cheeky is one of my favourites ever, it's such a beautiful colour on my skin tone and it looks really natural. It's also very easy to apply and blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous color!!! I've been using it daily and love how easy it is to apply and blend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous color and beautiful dewy but pigmented finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So easy to work with and the texture is very velvety!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a few merit blushes, all beautiful but this color is a soft pink that looks so natural

reviews.review_title: Best creme blush in my opinion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to blush, super easy blend on the go, and isn't harsh on my skin. I find a lot of blushes at Sephora break out, but this one doesn't. It is my holy grail cream blush, and the packaging looks fancy to me lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used this twice but it has stayed on all day, it has a beautiful sheer but buildable formula. It also looks great on the lips. It looks very natural and it's so easy to blend out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful! Applies and blends very well, natural glowy finish and perfect light pink shade for those hard to fit neutral skin tones.  Only wish it had a little more staying power. It will melt in/off after about 8-10 hrs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colour, texture & great packaging. Goes on & Blends well but doesn't last at all sadly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this blush for about a month and I have fallen in love!! It glides to easily and is so easy to blend on the go! I love it!! The only thing is it's not as pigmented but it's super buildable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is really nice and very blendable. The color is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to everyday blush. I have two shades and will be adding more shades to my make up kit. Sit on the skin beautifully

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite blush, super bendable and easy to apply!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best blush ever! I usually do not really write reviews, but this blush takes 1 second to apply and is so easy to blend out. I love the creamy texture and its so easy to use quickly!
Perfect if you want a natural blush it fit perfectly on my skin and it's not a problem to apply on your face it's super easy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best cream blush I've come across,  This product has such a natural, glowy finish !! It  really is beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful flush of color! This product blends beautifully into the skin and is gorgeous for layering overtop a bronzer. Seems to blur dark spots in the process of being breakout friendly! It is so easy to blend and just melts into the skin no matter what tool you apply it with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to blush! So easy to use and always looks great. The color is stunning and one that this can fit any mood or occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros - Nice product. It glides on smoothly, and is easy to work with. Cons - potential to cause breakouts, wears off easily, and is extremely expensive for what you're getting. IMO there are better products out there, for a fraction of the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is very pretty but it is very very settled. It doesn't really show up much and I can't really drag it on my face because it will pick up my foundation.

reviews.review_title: This cream blush looks great on!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream blush looks great. I swipe a little directly onto my cheek and build it up if I want more color. It stays on all day, is not greasy and does not rub off at all. I use an elf stipple brush and setting spray once my makeup look is done.

reviews.review_title: beautiful blush and super easy to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the fact that you can just swipe the blush directly onto your face, and it's super easy to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The worst, I wish I had returned it. I can't believe how many good reviews this has. I'm dark skinned, it doesn't show up, looks ashy. Horrible formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first blush that makes me look GOOD! I was skeptical about the color at first, but it blends in very well, and looks perfect on fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good! Nice pigment and blends easily on the skin. Lasts all day over foundation aswell as on bare skin. Must have for me! Wish they also had one powder blush which is non condomegenic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely ever wear blush.. everu2026 This product is 10/10 and turned me in to a blush girlie! I want all the colours now ud83dude0d  (the swatch I attached is blended out)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this blush. it's not so much red or pink but it looks so natural. it looks like when ur in the sun all day and wake up the next morning and have that color on ur cheeks. love jt

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am very into the merit brand but I'm finding there is a learning curve to the products because they are all so balmy, which means blendable and wearable, however, can lead to patchiness and poor longevity. The shades are so pretty but I went with Beverly Hills since it's so hard to find. It's not very pigmented and I'm fair skinned. I have learned to use a brush and really dab it on or else it doesn't last. Overall it's okay but I wish it would stain.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beverly Hills and Stockholm THE BEST blushes i have ever used (besides shumumara) i love the lightweight yet pigmented aspect of the cheek balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: perfect amount of pigment and the shades are so beautiful. plus, it's beginner friendly! love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color and how easy it is to apply. It never looks overdone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! Perfect natural blush. gives you such a pretty glow. Probably wouldn't recommend for heavy glam. It's best for no makeup up or natural makeup looks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite blush color now!!! Just the perfect flush on my skin, and very buildable. I apply with a brush.

reviews.review_title: Not good for my current makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn't work well on top of makeup only on bare skin. Takes off any makeup underneath it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful terracotta shade in Fox, no fragrance, but this felt too balmy and greasy on my cheeks for my preference. It didn't dry down or wear well on my combo skin. Applied pre-powder, and I do live in a humid climate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like it! A little pricey but I love that it's made using clean ingredients. Super aesthetically pleasing packaging. Buildable and can use it with fingers, a brush, a Beauty Blender, etc. I don't see it lasting long so I wish it was cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this pretty and natural blush.  It's really wonderful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color but that's about it. Does not last on cheeks. Lasts longer on lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so pretty! I love how it applies and it is super easy to use! I recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is sooo pretty and natural! Definitely the perfect babydoll pink for fair skin, and it has such a beautiful lit-from-within finish. I also love how easy it is to apply to the lips for a monochromatic look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The reason I gave it 3 stars is because it don't last , literally wears off in 15 minutes, the formula is very moisturizing and the color is BEAUTIFUL , the Sephora employee recommended me this blush

reviews.review_title: Such an easy product to use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buildable and gorgeous I got the color fox and loved the warmth it gave me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the ease of application and the color but it melts away after a couple hours. I've had this issue with all the Merit products I wown. I wanted to love them but they don't last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing color and easy to wear. It glides on very easily and blends well. I think this is a great blush to wear daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy breezy application! Blends perfectly with my fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for the perfect blush that sings on my skin and I have finally found it!! I overlooked this shade because it is a more common looking color but WOW it looks so good on my neutral to cool toned skin. The application stays pigmented all day and just looks stunning. I highly recoomend this color and this blush overall!!

reviews.review_title: Need this formula in a stick foundation!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is the best thing thats ever happened to my skin. Ive played around and applied this so many different ways. Before foundation after foundation AFTER POWDER.. it makes my skin look hydrated and supple. If my face ever looks TOO powdery i go over it ever so gently with a powder brush and just dab, never swipe and it just brings back life to my face. But in all seriousness, i need this formula in a foundation because it looks so amazing on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to believe the hype, but this is a flop. If you apply this over foundation/concealer, it will just pick up the foundation and smudge. If you apply this with a dense brush, it's hardly noticeable. The formula is cheap and too compact. I was expecting it to glide onto my cheeks, but it's too waxy. I feel like the only way to wear this is WITHOUT makeup. Not to mention $30 for this little of product and cheap plastic packaging; purely marketing price pointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a day goes by where I don't wear this blush. It's so natural looking and it's such a pretty color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great blush works really nice. I recommend this product

reviews.review_title: Great for Oily or Dry Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it!  I put it on my flush balm cream blush. It is so smooth and so natural.  After I put cream blush, I use dry powder blush and brush gently over it because I have oily skin; that way, it stays all day and night.  It turns out fantastic.  I love the color baby pink. Perfect for me and much to my satisfaction!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this color! My one critique is it doesn't dry down as much as I would like and kind of remains sticky. The dewiness is gorgeous but I don't like the feeling of it on my face!

reviews.review_title: THE BEST BLUSH ON THE ENTIRE MARKET!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best blush I have ever in my life used. It looks phenomenal. So glowy and you can't go wrong with any shade. Fox is def my favorite! Blends super easy, super sheer, but 100% buildable. It also lasts so long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shade Beverly Hills is beautiful and the formula is great. It feels amazing on the skin and looks super dewy and natural. Sometimes I find that this shade isn't as pigmented and I have to use quite a bit of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Glides like butter,  im in love but it's just too small for the price but the shade beverly hills is just amazing!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, the only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because i have to reapply at least once a day
